boardgame.description: This is Wizards of the Coast's Star Wars Miniatures game, similar to their D_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp;D Miniatures offerings. Each figure is pre-painted and comes with a stats card._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Squads are point-based and are usually formed around one of nine factions. Games are character-based skirmishes played on a square grid._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Not to be confused with West End Games' older Star Wars Miniatures Battles or Wizards of the Coast's starship offering: Star Wars Miniatures: Starship Battles._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;FIGURES WERE RELEASED IN THE FOLLOWING:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Rebel Storm (standard 60 piece set - initial set)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Clone Strike (standard 60 piece set)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Revenge of the Sith (standard 60 piece set)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Universe (standard 60 piece set - includes huge figures)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;AT-AT Imperial Walker Colossal Pack (special pack for scenario play)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Attack On Endor (scenario pack with 4 pieces)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Champions of the Force (standard 60 piece set)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Bounty Hunters (standard 60 piece set - includes huge figures)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Alliance and Empire (standard 60 piece set)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Rebels and Imperials (24 piece set - all reprints from previous sets, released in packs of 2 figures each)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Force Unleashed (standard 60 piece set - includes huge figures)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Battle of Hoth (Target Exclusive) (scenario pack with 17 pieces)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Legacy of the Force (standad 60 piece set)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Knights of the Old Republic (standard 60 piece set)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Clone Wars Starter Set (scenario pack with 6 pieces)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Clone Wars (standard 40 piece set)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Clone Wars Battles Scenario Pack (Target Exclusive) (scenario pack with 10 pieces)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Imperial Entanglements (standard 40 piece set)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Map Packs x3 (three scenario packs with 2 pieces each)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Jedi Academy (standard 40 piece set)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Galaxy at War (standard 40 piece set)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Dark Times (standard 40 piece set)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Masters of the Force (standard 40 piece set)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

stars wars miniatures from rebel storm, clone strike, and revenge of the sith-boosters and starters(figures and cards only, some duplicates but very few) 53 commons, 21 un commons, and 12 rares and one very rare!

Selling the Star Wars Miniatures Revenge of the Sith Starter game with 8 extra miniatures. Game is complete and all components are in very good condition. If you would like additional pictures, email me and I will send them to you. The game originally came with six miniatures with matching stat cards. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m including eight additional miniatures with their matching stat cards. Iâ€™m willing to negotiate on price. THIS GAME INCLUDES: Quick Start Rule Book, Advanced Rule Book, Game Board, 20-Sided Die, Damage and Force Counters, Revenge of the Sith Set Checklist. THE FOLLOWING MINIATURES ARE INCLUDED: Obi Wan Kenobi, General Grievous, Republic Commando-Boss, Varactyl Wrangler, Lignalight Demolitionist, Dark Trooper Phase 1, Old Republic Soldier, Sandtrooper, Clone Trooper (2), Super Battle Droid(2), Republic Commando-Scorch(2) This item weighs between 2-3 lbs. I can give you the exact cost when you tell me where I will be shipping. I will only accept a personal checks and money orders from buyers within the United States. Personal checks take 7 business days to clear my back. Once the check clears, I will ship the item. PayPal is the only acceptable payment for buyers outside the United States.

I have about 800 SWM that I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d like to sell if possible since I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m not playing the game anymore and really want them to be used by a gamer with more passion for the game than I do. If anyone is interested, shoot me an email and I can send over the list and we can try to hammer out a deal. . .
reserved for xerx39. includes mage knight, fluxx, lord of the fries

Hello, this is a starter set of 6 painted miniatures, that comes from a non-smoking no pets house in Tennessee. The characters listed are Heavy Stormtrooper, Rebel Captain, Elite Stormtrooper. It also comes with full color game stat cards, rulebook, double sided full color battle map, 20 sided die and damage counters. It says it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s for two players.

Star Wars Miniatures Revenge of the Sith Starter Game (2005 orange box) from Wizards of the Coast Box: Light shelfwear with a few minor dings, dents and wrinkles. Overall box is in excellent condition! Contents: Complete and in like new condition! The damage counters are still unpunched. The minis included are: Obi-Wan Kenobi (#15) General Grievous (#32) Two Clone Troopers (#8) Two Super Battle Droids (#39) SHIPPING: U.S. shipping will be via USPS Priority Shipping and based on a weight of 3 lbs. from zip code 85208. International buyers are very welcome, but please contact me before buying for a shipping price quote to avoid any surprises or misunderstandings.

In very good condition.

For sale is a collection of mixed Star Wars Miniatures figures. The set includes: 42 individual figures 4 large vehicle figures (See photos) All figures have an accompanying data card, sleeved (+20 extra sleeves). There is also one double sided map of some kind of ground installation, in better than Good shape. There are no other parts, rules, or charts included. FIGURES _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; CARDS ONLY. If you are looking for something in particular and the photos don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t do it for you, send me a geekmail and I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll have a look. The only personalities I recognized were General Grievous, and Jedi Wendu. I will insure the item, if requested, for an additional $5 (but these really don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t need it). S_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;H of $12 is for US addresses only. I am willing to ship worldwide if you are willing to pay the international shipping charges.
